name: Chikun Litecoin Mascot
description: Inspired by the legendary "Arise Chikun Arise" meme by Litecoin creator Charlie Lee, our cryptocurrency project, Chikun, is a fusion of internet humor and cutting-edge blockchain technology. Drawing from the triumphant spirit of the meme, Chikun embraces decentralization and accessibility. But Chikun is more than a token—it’s a vibrant community. Featuring telegram games and original artwork themed around the iconic meme.
